body: it gets converted to a float32 tensor anyway somewhere.  use cast, or use ops.convert_to_tensor(length_penalty_, log_probs.dtype) if you want it to error out if someone provides a float32 *tensor* penalty but does float16 calculations.  that's probably better anyway.
